title: Evidence for Results for Medication Adherence at 12 weeks in QUARTET USA Trial Control Group

note.text: 30 (numberOfParticipants) matches 70% reported in table 2 of the published article and the data reported in ClinicalTrials.gov, instead of 28 as number analyzed as reported in Figure 1, so numberAnalyzed not reported in this Evidence Resource.
